```{r}
twfe_model <- function(outcome, data) {
  return(plm(paste0(outcome, " ~ post_treatment +", covariates), 
               data = data, 
               index = c("GEOID", "year"), 
               model = "within", 
               effect = "twoways"))
  
}

trend_model <- function(outcome, data) {
  return(plm(paste0(outcome, " ~ post_treatment + treatment + post + year + ", covariates), 
               data = data, 
               index = c("GEOID"), 
               model = "within", 
               effect = "individual"))
  
}

generate_model_output <- function(fit_plm, outcome, model_type, print) {
  sum_fit_plm <- summary(fit_plm)
  if (print == TRUE) {
      sum_fit_plm %>% 
      print() 
  }

  coef_vals <- coeftest(fit_plm,
                        vcovHC(fit_plm, type = 'HC3', cluster = 'group'))
  
  coef <- round(sum_fit_plm$coefficients[1, 1], 3)
  se <- round(coef_vals[1, 2], 3)
  pval <- round(coef_vals[1, 4], 4)
  coef_ast <- case_when(pval < 0.01 ~ paste0(coef, "***"),
                        pval < 0.05 ~ paste0(coef, "**"),
                        pval < 0.1 ~ paste0(coef, "*"))
  
  return(data.frame("outcome" = outcome,
               "treatment_post" = sum_fit_plm$coefficients[1, 1],
               "coef_asterisk" = coef_ast,
               "se" = se,
               "pval" = pval,
               "rsq" = round(sum_fit_plm$r.squared[[1]], 3),
               "model_type" = model_type))
}

run_model_outcome <- function(outcome, data=merged_oz, covariates=cov, print=TRUE) {
  covariates <- str_c(covariates, collapse = " + ")
  print(str_c("Running model for ", outcome))
  
  fit_plm <- twfe_model(outcome, data)
  results <- generate_model_output(fit_plm, outcome, "twfe", print=print)
  
  fit_plm_trend <- trend_model(outcome, data)
  results <- bind_rows(results, generate_model_output(fit_plm_trend, outcome, "time_trend", print=print))
  return(results)
}

run_model_outcome("S000_same_tract", print=TRUE)
```
